wikipedia_page.main: Paul Grant (born 23 March 1993) is a Scottish footballer, who plays as a goalkeeper for Musselburgh Athletic. Grant has previously played for Hibernian, Berwick Rangers, Livingston, Bonnyrigg Rose,  Tranent Juniors,  Broxburn Athletic and Whitehill Welfare.

response: *Paul Grant (guitarist), member of 3 Colours Red rock band
*Paul Grant (physicist) (born 1935), American/Irish physicist and science writer
*Paul Grant (rugby union) (born 1987), New Zealand rugby union player
